prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Bass, Piano, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Guitar, Drums, Piano, and Bass, Pipe excluded.
